author: Steve Dent
title: Get $66 off Withings' low-key Steel HR smartwatch
description: Withings has eked out a nice niche in the activity tracker game with smartwatches that look nice and do exactly what you need them to do. The attractive Steel HR embodies that idea with handsome analog looks and a clever display of important health functions …
content: As we noted in our hands-on look at the Steel HR Sport, you get a main dial for the time, a sub-dial that shows the progress toward your goals and a circular digital display up top. The latter can display health-related data like heart rate, distance traveled…

title: Camaraderie, confrontation & characters – life inside the dressing room
description: The dressing room is football's inner sanctum but little is known about what goes on there. BBC Sport hears from players who have experienced the good - and the bad.
content:
Dressing rooms are the one place at a football stadium the television cameras rarely enter

The dressing room is football's inner sanctum, a place which can be defined by great togetherness or deep division, where games can be won or lost before a ball is eve…

author: Antonio Villas-Boas
title: The latest Apple Watch Series 5 is $50 off right now — starting from $349
description: Several models of the Apple Watch Series 5 are $50 off. The wearable starts at $399, but can be had for $349 from Best Buy. The Apple Watch Series 5 comes with a variety of sizable upgrades, especially for those with with the Series 1, 2, or 3 versions. Those…

title: PDC launching 'home tour' with players set to compete from own homes for 32 nights
